meanings.sent1: She decided to reengrave her initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist was reengraving the intricate design on the metal plate.
meanings.sent3: After a mistake, he had to reengrave the message, making sure to spell it right this time.
meanings.sent4: The idea was so important to her that she felt like reengraving it in her memory.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the chisel reengraving the stone echoed through the quiet workshop.

meanings.sent1: He carefully reengraved the family crest on the antique ring.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler was skilled at reengraving old coins with new designs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel seemed to enjoy reengraving patterns in the sand.
meanings.sent4: Her words were etched in his mind, like a reengraved promise.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands moved swiftly, reengraving the worn-out symbol with precision.
